Detailed Description

Describes the mapping between the logical and physical ports.

This struct is used to store the spirit:portMap element info. It can be used to map logical ports, defined in abstraction definition to physical ports, defined in component description.

Definition at line 544 of file generaldeclarations.h.

QSharedPointer<Vector> General::PortMap::logicalVector_

The optional vector element for the logical Port.

If this element exists then the port is vectored and it's type is std_logic_vector. This element specifies the left and right bound of the vectored port.

Definition at line 552 of file generaldeclarations.h.

QSharedPointer<Vector> General::PortMap::physicalVector_

The optional vector element for the physical port.

If this element exists then the port is vectored and it's type is std_logic_vector. This element specifies the left and right bound of the vectored port.
